c74object.name: hidapi
c74object.discussion: Refer to hidapi documentation for more information -> https://github.com/libusb/hidapi

outlet.digest: Get data returned from hidapi function

method.name: open
method.description: Usage: [open index] or [open vendor-id product-id] or [open vendor-id product-id serial-number]. Open hid device. Send enumerate before using index. If already opened this method will close previously opened device first. Nonblocking will set to 1 as soon as device opened. Returns 0 or -1 on error.

method.name: write
method.description: Usage: [write length report-id arguments..]. Write data to hid device. length and report-id are mandatory but arguments are optional. If size of arguments are not same as length hidapi appends 0 to data written. Returns actual number of bytes written or -1 on error.

method.name: read
method.description: Usage: [read length report-id]. Read data from hid device. length and report-id are mandatory. If actual number of bytes read from device is not same as length, returned data length is same as length argument. Returns actual number of bytes read and data returned from device or -1 on error.

method.name: close
method.description: Usage: [close]. Close previously opened hid device. Returns 0.

method.name: get_product_string
method.description: Usage: [get_product_string]. Returns product string as symbol or -1 on error.

method.name: get_manufacturer_string
method.description: Usage: [get_manufacturer_string]. Returns manufacturer string as symbol or -1 on error

method.name: get_serial_number_string
method.description: Usage: [get_serial_number_string]. Returns serial number string as symbol or -1 on error

method.name: get_indexed_string
method.description: Usage: [get_indexed_string index]. Returns indexed string as symbol or -1 on error

method.name: error
method.description: Usage: [error]. Returns last generated error as symbol or -1 if no error generated

method.name: set_nonblocking
method.description: Usage: [set_nonblocking nonblocking]. Set nonblocking. nonblocking is mandatory. Please keep in mind, writing 0 to nonblocking could crash Max. Returns 0 or -1 on error.

method.name: enumerate
method.description: Usage: [enumerate]. Enumerate devices. Returns index vendor_id product_id serial_number manufacturer_string product_string release_number page usage_page path. You can store returned list directly in coll object.

method.name: open_path
method.digest: Open device using os specific path
method.description: Usage: [open_path path]. Open device using os specific path. path is mandatory. You can get this path using enumerate method. Returns 0 or -1 on error.

method.name: send_feature_report
method.digest: Send feature report to hid device
method.description: Usage: [send_feature_report length report-id arguments..]. Send feature report to hid device. length and report-id are mandatory but arguments are optional. If size of arguments are not same as length hidapi appends 0 to data written. Returns actual number of bytes written or -1 on error.

method.name: get_feature_report
method.digest: Get feature report from hid device
method.description: Usage: [get_feature_report length report-id]. Get feature report from hid device. length and report-id are mandatory. Returns actual number of bytes read and data returned from device or -1 on error.

method.name: get_input_report
method.digest: Get input report from hid device
method.description: Usage: [get_input_report length report-id]. Get input report from hid device. length and report-id are mandatory. Returns actual number of bytes read and data returned from device or -1 on error.

method.name: info
method.description: Usage: [info]. Prints all connected devices info to console
